lego.target: not going to be able to

practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to be able to speak.
I'm not going to be able to learn.
I'm not going to be able to remember.
I'm not going to be able to stop.
I'm not going to be able to speak easily.
I'm not going to be able to finish today.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我不会记住这个词的。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm not going to be able to remember this word.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我在学习，所以我不会停的。
practice_phrases.target: Because I'm learning, I'm not going to be able to stop.

practice_phrases.known: 我不会轻易记住答案的。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to be able to remember the answer easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我不确定我会不会说英语。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to speak English.
